about_the_game:
Story:

Fed up with being called "KURWA" by everyone, three beavers decide to escape the drudgery of Polish life and seek their fortune elsewhere. However, their journey to freedom is far from easy, as the dense Polish forest is teeming with dangerous creatures and treacherous obstacles.

Gameplay:


BOBR KURWA is a roguelike inspired by Polish Beaver memes that puts an emphasis on hardcore gameplay.
You control three unique beaver heroes simultaneously, each with their own distinct spells and upgradeable abilities. Your objective is to guide them through the perilous Polish forest, battling enemies and overcoming challenges, until they finally reach the border and escape to freedom.

Game Modes:

  • Story Mode: Embark on a thrilling narrative adventure as you progress through a series of levels, each offering unique challenges and rewards. Choose your path carefully, as each route presents varying degrees of difficulty and potential rewards. While you can progress through the story by completing any path, completing them all will unlock additional secrets and bonuses.

  • Survival Mode: Test your mettle in an endless onslaught of increasingly powerful enemies in this intense survival mode.

Future Plans:

If the community shows enough interest, the following features are planned for future updates:
  • Gamepad Support: Experience the thrill of BOBR KURWA with the comfort of a gamepad.
  • Language Support: Expand your beaver-brawling horizons with support for additional languages.
  • New Storylines: Immerse yourself in even more captivating beaver tales with additional storylines.
  • New Biomes: Explore diverse new environments, including rivers, swamps, fields, and even a bustling city.
  • Enhanced Environmental Interaction: Discover deeper interactions with the game world, adding new layers of strategy and challenge.
  • Expanded Enemy Roster: Face off against a wider variety of formidable foes.
  • More Items and Abilities: Uncover a treasure trove of new items and abilities to enhance your beaver heroes' arsenal.

short_description: Prepare for a wild and unforgiving adventure in BOBR KURWA, the hardcore roguelike that will test your skills and push you to the limits! You control 3 unique heroes at once, each with distinct spells that can be upgraded. The goal is to escape from Poland through a crowd of enemies.
